column1: Art Institute of Chicago////When I was younger
column2: I remember seeing lots of pottery and not as many of the famous paintings. Then when my friend from out of town was visiting
column3: we ended up seeing the pottery again. If you walk in the order of the museum (from the main entrance)
column4: you will not get to see the famous paintings
column5: especially if you are visiting on a free day when there are only 2 hours or if you are in a time crunch.
